lead_paragraph: Padraig Harrington, Thomas Bjorn and Paul Lawrie will serve as  assistant captains when Europe defend the Ryder Cup against the United States in September.

headline.print_headline: Harrington, Bjorn, Lawrie Named Ryder Cup Deputies
headline.main: Harrington, Bjorn, Lawrie Named Ryder Cup Deputies

snippet: Padraig Harrington, Thomas Bjorn and Paul Lawrie will serve as  assistant captains when Europe defend the Ryder Cup against the United States in September....
